title: Got perma banned, just want help
body: So today I got perma banned for verbal abuse ect. I'm not going to lie it was fairly bad and I probably deserve This, but I think perma is too much as I have had no prior warnings as I have only recently started being toxic and racist I don't know why or what is going through my head and I know that I have messed up big time. I have spent a large amount of money on my account and feel very ripped off. I'm just wondering if there is anything I can do to remove the ban as I know what I did was wrong and i will try my hardest to not be toxic or anything like that in future I apologize for what I have done. I really just want my account back even if it was a 100 day suspension or perma chat block or restriction but I really think that perma ban is to much. I know there is little chance of this happening based off what I have said in my recent matches. But I have to try. Please can someone help me I promise I will never ever be toxic racist flame or even swear towards another player again, I would really just like to play the game again without having to put in another 2-3 years worth of game time and a crap ton of money into another account, thanks for reading and I appreciate any help or even clarification on if anything can be done. Thanks Hellvast

replies.body: ok yea thats fair enough, im just confused as i thought that chat restrictions and suspensions for a certain time came before perma ban and i have had no warnings or anything else before this perma ban, and i am really pissed off as i have spent a crap load of money on the game for it to be gone with the click of a finger and nothing to be done about it, as for things being said to me, there is little chance of me taking offense to things being said to me but i understand that others do take offense and ik what i said was horrible but i really feel like permanently banning a player without giving them any warning or other consequence is   just stupid. i also would like to just say that there is a mute button if people get offended by what others say over the internet, that does not mean i am saying im not in the wrong as i fully am, i would just like to know if i will ever get my account back??? otherwise ive wasted over $1000 that i will never see ever again, which i find as stealing money. sure i did spend it by my own choice but i didnt know 2 games worth of being toxic could get you permad without warnings

Racism/hate speech and the like is treated very seriously, and is one of the things that is nigh guaranteed to skip you some punishment tiers. Two games of racism is well within the bounds of reasonable for a permanent suspension.

Basically any severe behaviours can skip you punishment tiers, as it becomes less a "can we reform this player" and more a "we need to get this behaviour out of the community".

tl;dr You will not be getting your account back. You're free to start a new one, but continue with the racism and you'll be perma banned again very quickly.

> $1000 that i will never see ever again,

Don't be toxic, simple. When you play this game, you agree that you won't do the things they ban you for.
mute people and enjoy your day/night playing league of legends.

and to be banned within two games, you were probably Very toxic.

> I have only recently started being toxic and **racist**

Well sir, I have found your problem. Riot takes a firm stance against racism, sexism and homophobia and engaging in this kind of behaviour can and will skip punishment tiers straight to the permaban.  

_why?_ because if you are playing league of legends, it is assumed you are above 13 years of age. Even before this age, with your underdeveloped pre-frontal cortex, you should know that being a racist/sexist/homophobe isn't ok! In IRL if you were to do the same kind of thing you could [easily lose your job](https://www.theguardian.com/world/2013/dec/22/pr-exec-fired-racist-tweet-aids-africa-apology) or even get [yourself into a really dangerous situation ](http://www.news.com.au/technology/online/social/blogger-gaye-clark-gets-death-threats-over-racist-howto-guide/news-story/68792d4c8b6286f23314ad6d35978172).

Super sorry, but it is highly unlikely that you will be getting your account back, as they have the chat logs and even you, yourself admitting you were being a racist. 

Something to take away from this, is to learn not to be a ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ in your games. Even if you are super frustrated, take it out by verbalising IRL instead of typing into chat. Its way easier, and you can't get punished for it. If it doesn't help your team, or you would be pissed af if someone said it to you or a member of your family/friends, don't type it in chat!!
